Text: Den gick på SVT. Det är bara SVT som har goda smaken att köpa in såna brittiska humorserier (annat exempel: smack the pony). Vi får hoppas att de köper in "Dead ringers" också.

Hi, thanks for this. Great show, you've got taste man. One tiny comment though: could you please add your description in English? It is a lot more comprehensible for someone who isn't from where you're from...
And please add info on LANGUAGE/SUBs as well, so prospective downloaders  know what to expect ;-)
Ciao,
BG

Good advice Captainbeefheart, a little understandable info would surely be nice! Great show, can't wait to laugh my ass off once again, thanks for putting this out there Mr High Enough, 
I bid you good day.
Absolutely top class, took about 12 hours to download but totally worth it.  Funniest tv show of all time, dvd quality.
